title: Frontend Engineer
description:
Function: Software Engineering → Frontend Development

CSSHTMLJavaScriptVue.jsReact.js
Responsibilities:

Develop responsive, performant, and accessible web interfaces using modern frameworks (React, Vue, or similar).
Translate design mockups and wireframes into functional components.
Integrate frontend with RESTful or GraphQL APIs.
Optimize applications for speed and scalability.
Collaborate closely with product and design teams to refine user experience.
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices.


Requirements:

1-3 years of experience in frontend development.
Proficiency in HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript (ES6+), and React.js (or a similar framework).
Understanding of state management (Redux, Zustand, Recoil, etc. ).
Experience working with APIs and modern build tools (Webpack, Vite, etc. ).
Familiarity with Git and collaborative development workflows.
Strong attention to UI/UX details and performance optimization.



Benefits at Origa
Flexible hybrid work environment • Learning and development budget • Performance-based travel opportunities • Significant growth • Competitive compensation with equity participation

Origa's Tech Stack
Machine LearningCCRMRESTGraphQLHTMLCSS JavaScriptReact.jsReduxVue.jsGit
reasoning: Praful is a strong fit with his React.js expertise and experience in building responsive web interfaces, aligning well with the Frontend Engineer role.
gap_analysis:
⚠️ Gaps: Experience is slightly above the 1-3 year range, and specific state management experience (Zustand, Recoil) isn't explicitly mentioned.
💡 Strategy: Emphasize experience with Redux and highlight any projects where you've optimized for speed and scalability to address potential concerns about experience level.
